name: Iggy's Tetris [BETA]
description:
[Currently not optimised for mobile, the game is only compatible for PC.]

I made this demo re-make of Tetris to learn more about Unity 2d. The project is for no means meant to be an official launch, and still remains in heavy development.

Projected updates:
- Major bug fixes
- Rewards
- Publishing the game to the chrome store

Please be aware that all data in the game may be wiped at any point in time. All content in the game is subject to change.
